shows.title: The Racket
shows.desc: Hailing from near Liverpool – the home, we’re reliably informed, of several successful popular combos – The Racket do exactly what they say on the tin. Their glorious noise bottles the swagger of the Gallaghers, the tight melodies of the Strokes and the ring-a-ding of the Libertines. Fight your way to the front. Can I get a Widnes? #sorrynotsorry
